c74object.name: alea.oneoverf
c74object.digest: Generates 1/f noise using a simple algorithm based on Clarke and Voss
c74object.description: Generates 1/f noise using a simple algorithm based on Clarke and Voss

method.name: reset
method.digest: Reset to default start and nop values
method.description: Reset to default start and nop values

method.name: mode
method.digest: Set the output mode (0 for float, 1 for int)
method.description: Set the output mode (0 for float, 1 for int)

method.name: bang
method.digest: Generate and output a random number
method.description: Generate and output a random number
